Commercial Real Estate

At Scarinci Hollenbeck, we represent many public, private, and institutional clients, assisting them in every aspect of the acquisition, development, financing, construction, and utilization of real property assets.

At Scarinci Hollenbeck, we represent many public, private, and institutional clients, assisting them in every aspect of the acquisition, development, financing, construction, and utilization of real property assets. Our Commercial Real Estate transactional group is made up of accomplished practitioners with many years of experience. Moreover, they work closely with our Environmental attorneys, who have a proven track record in securing development rights for some of the largest office, retail, industrial, and multi-family development and redevelopment projects in the region. Rounding out the picture, our Commercial Lending group, an acknowledged leader in the industry, ably assists our clients in handling their real estate financing needs.

A sophisticated real estate asset practice entails the need for expertise in varied matters. With over twenty lawyers and paraprofessionals, our Commercial Real Estate group is committed to providing the highest degree of excellence with respect to every area of the practice at predictable and conservative rates. Our lawyers have extensive experience in such diverse areas as Mount Laurel requirements, environmental remediation, smart growth and green development, redevelopment, like-kind exchanges, commercial condominiums, construction contracts, farmland assessments, real property tax appeals, and PILOT agreements, among others, making Scarinci Hollenbeck your single source for real estate development and utilization. Whether the property in question is an office building, a retail shopping mall, a planned unit residential development, a warehouse, a hotel, or an industrial facility, and whether you require assistance in buying, leasing, financing, developing or redeveloping, we have the expertise to accomplish your goals. Check the Commercial Real Estate group’s attorney profiles for a list of representative matters.

Scarinci Hollenbeck works hard to deliver to our real estate clients a sophisticated and seasoned level of representation at a reasonable and predictable cost. The lawyers in the Commercial Real Estate Group implement this philosophy by judicious staffing, bringing to bear the appropriate level of experience for the job. Such an approach allows us to provide legal services of the highest caliber efficiently and economically. We also take a value added approach to every client, endeavoring wherever possible to leverage our experience to provide advice on how to maximize profits, minimize expenses, and increase the bottom line.

  • zoning & planning for office, retail, multi-family, hotel, and planned unit development
  • redevelopment projects
  • retail, office, and warehouse leasing
  • construction contracts
  • operating agreements
  • ground pad space leases, licenses and occupancy agreements
  • architect, engineering and other professional agreements
  • purchases (including feasibility analysis) and sales
  • corporate, partnership, or LLC formation
  • joint venture agreements
  • affordable housing
  • commercial and residential condominiums
  • “Brownfield” and “Blackfield” developments
  • financing, including “like kind” exchanges
  • tax incentives, development incentives and “PILOT” agreements
